(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
Come on.
I hope...

text: Bundan sonra kılıcına sahip çıkamayan hele...
english: ...who cannot hold his sword after this...
Pusat is not a monster.

text: Pusatlarımız gök gülüp kızıl çıkaydı da...
english: If only our swords were red and blue...
...Ertugrul Bey would not have had this shame.

text: Ertugrul Bey'miz şimdi kim bilir ne haldedir. Öfkeden delirmiştir.
english: Ertugrul Bey is in a bad state. He is furious.
Peace be upon you.

text: Aleyküm selam ve ahmetullahi ve berekatuhu.
english: Peace be upon you and God's mercy and blessings.
Peace be upon you.

text: Selameti gaybun. Aşıklara vuslat bir sır Cenab-ı Hazreti Abdülkadir el-Geylani el-Fatiha.
english: and the safety of the unseen. May the secret of the Almighty, the Most High, be revealed to the lovers.
Allahümme salli ala Seyyidina Muhammad
Allah is great. Allah is great. Allah is great.
Allah, Allah, Allah, Allah, Allah,
Allah is great. Allah is great. Allah is great. Allah is great.

text: Allah, Allah, Ya Allah! Allah, Allah, Ya Allah! Allah, Allah, Ya Allah!
english: Allah, Allah, Ya Allah! Allah, Allah, Ya Allah! Allah, Allah, Ya Allah!

text: Allah'ım. Sen kuluna taşıyamayacağı yüklemezsin. Bütün obanın yükünü omzuna koydun.
english: God. You are the only one who can carry me. You put all the burden of the tribe on my shoulders.

text: Bana bu yükün altında kalkmayı nasip eyle yarabbim.
english: I don't want to be under this burden.

text: Sen ki Yusuf'u kuyudan çıkarıp mısıra sultan yapansın.
english: You are the one who took Yusuf out of the well and made him the Sultan.

text: Kuyudan çıkmak için bana bir imkan ver yarabbi.
english: Give me a chance to get out of this well, God.
(Music)
Come on!
Come on, come on, come on, come on.
Help! Help!
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
Farah!
Come on.
(Music)
(Music)
Wake up, son.
I am the one who is the ruler of the world. I am the ruler of the world. I am the ruler of the world.

text: Esadık o ha, fenalik bir selam.
english: The man of the house is the master of the house.
(Music)
Thank you, my God.
Did you do it? Did you manage to do it? Come on!

text: Dur yapma! Neden öldürdüm? Ne oluyor burada?
english: Stop! Why did you kill him? What is going on here?

text: Sizden çok şey öğrendik Emir Hazretleri.
english: We have learned a lot from you, His Highness Ameer.
We will not only use our weapons in your city...

text: Aynı zamanda canımızı da korumamız gerekiyormuş.
english: We also need to protect ourselves.
Who is this man?
The Templar.
No!
Come on.
What did you talk about at dinner?

text: Ne istiyormuş Elaziz'den? Kayılar, kışlamak için yer istediler emirden.
english: What does El Aziz want from you? Kayis. They asked for a place to stay for the winter.
You should take what the Kayis want.
How? I don't understand.
The place they will take.

text: Haçlı Kontluğun sınırlarında olsun. Sadece Ertuğrul değil, soyunu da kurutmak için bundan daha iyi bir fırsat olamaz.
english: He should be at the border of the Crusaders. He can't have a better chance than this to establish his lineage......not only Ertugrul.
Kayis.

text: Hamonos eteklerinde kimsenin gelip geçmediği Antakya koltuğun sınırlarında kışlasın.
english: Let it rain in the winter in the Antioch counties... where no one comes and goes in the Hamonos.
They will have their last winter.

text: Titus, ne dediğinin farkındasın değil mi?
english: Titus, you know what you are saying, right?
This is a dangerous game.
Do as I say, Nasir.
You will not leave them alone. They will follow you wherever you go.

text: ...aldığı her nefesi bana bildireceksin. Al bu güvercinleri.
english: You will inform me of every breath he takes. Take these pigeons.
Come on.

text: Obanın da kahramanı olduğum yüzden bakıyorum.
english: I am looking at you as the head of the tribe.
Don't look at my face either.

text: Süleyman Şah obanın mallarını satmamız için bize vermeyecekmiş.
english: Suleyman Shah won't give us the goods to sell.
We came to the tribe for nothing.

text: Gel bakalım, kervana hazırlamama yardım et. Gel lan ulan.
english: Come on, help me prepare the caravan.

text: Kahramanlığın bana sökmez Afşin. Açlıktan nefesin kokuyorken seni yanıma aldım.
english: Your heroism won't destroy me Afsin. I took you with me when you were hungry.

text: Yedirdim içirdim. Adam ettim seni. Şimdi dönemezsin. Bana borçlusun.
english: I fed you, I made you drink, I made you a man. You can't come back now. You owe me.
I am sorry. Thank you, my Bey.

text: İnsanın hem iyi bir tüccar olması...
english: A good trader is...

text: Hem de böyle iyi silah kullanması pek görüldük bir şey değil. Dün gece bu yaralı halinle iyi mücadele etmişsin.
english: And it is not a common thing to use such a good weapon. You fought well with this wounded man last night.

text: Tacirin cazgırının da senden kalır yanı yok. Tüccarlığımız iyi olsaydı...
english: And the merchant's business is still the same. If only our trade union was good.

text: Böyle beş parasız çocuklarla kala kalmazdım.
english: I would not have stayed with such a poor child.
When the sword comes...

text: Bizim Kılıç'tan anladığımız çocuklarla evleşmek gibi. Hepsi bu.
english: He wants to marry the children we know from Kiliç.

text: İnşallah yakında size verdiğimiz eziyet bitecek beyim.
english: I hope the torment we gave you will end soon, my Bey.
I'm not going to let you go.
Yes, sir. That is our only hope.
I owe you.
Look at me you bastard!

text: Senin için yıllarca köpek gibi çalıştım. Bütün iyiliklerin borcunu da ödedim. Düş yakamdan şimdi.
english: I worked like a dog for you for years. I paid for all your sins. Get out of my way now.
Get lost!
I'm sorry.
A merchant...
One is a caravan footman.
But the weapons are for the war.
You've found each other.

text: Kara Toygar'ın obadaki adamının kim olduğunu edense...
english: I think Kara Toygar knows...
I don't care.
(Music)
What are you doing? Stop!
Stop! You're committing a sin!
...will not be in the sight of God.

text: Eğer bir bebeğimiz olsaydı her şey başka olurdu.
english: If I had a baby, everything would be different.
Oh, Hatun.
One day, our baby will be born.
God is the best.

text: Anne. Halime'yi neredeyse baş tacı edecek.
english: Mother. He will make Halime a head priest.
Selcan, don't make it longer.
You are not aware of what happened.

text: Kilimhanede ona gösterdiği saygıyı bilmiyorsun. Benden esirgediği saygıyı ona gösteriyor. Sanki ben oğlunun karısı değilim de hizmetçisiymişim gibi davranıyor bana.
english: You don't know the respect he showed her in the clinic. He shows her the respect he showed me. He treats me as if I were his servant, not his wife.

text: Neden? Bir bebeğim olmuyor da ondan.
english: Why? I do not have a baby, that is why.
...is not worthy of me.
Selcan, you are taking my mother's sin.

text: Böyle şeylere tenezzül etmez o. Ben onun ne düşündüğünü çok iyi biliyorum.
english: He won't give up on such things. I know what he's thinking very well.

text: Ya kadın! Bak tam kervan öncesi seninle kırdılarını dinleyemem tamam mı? Allah aşkına! Anlamıyorsun değil mi? Halimeler bu obaya kazık çakacak diyorum ama senin umrunda bile değil. Ya!
english: Woman! Look, this is just before the caravan. I cannot listen to your nonsense, okay? For God's sake! You do not understand, do you? I say Halime will be a great help to this tribe......but she is not even worth your attention.
Oh, patience.
(Music)
(Music)

text: Gündoğdu kendini iyi topladı çok şükür.
english: Thank God, Gundogdu has recovered well.
He deserved to be the leader of the caravan.
...as he deserves to carry wood.
God willing, your pride will be defeated.
If God permits, Hayme.

text: İnşallah. Kervanı çok çabuk topladı yalnız. Hiç kolay bir şey değil.
english: If God permits. The caravan was picked up very quickly, it is not easy.
He works day and night with his teeth and nails.
May God be with you.
Sometimes...
What is the matter?

text: Yok bir şey. Hayme, aklından ne geçiyor?
english: Nothing. Hayme, what is on your mind?
I do not know, my Bey.
...and they would have been so happy.
Don't worry.

text: İkisi de sağ salim gidip gelecek.
english: They will both go and come back safe and sound.
If God permits.
God willing. Halime, come and eat something.

text: Ay kız şunu bitireyim hemen geleyim. Tamam peki bekliyorum.
english: Let me finish this and come back. Okay, I'm waiting.
(Music)
I am not a child anymore.
Sister, what have you done?

text: Ne hesap soracağına işine bak sen.
english: What are you doing?

text: Ne attın kazanın içine? Seni o kızdan kurtarmaya çalışıyorum.
english: What did you throw in the pot? I was trying to get you out of that girl.
Sister, what you did is not right.

text: Ayrıca mevzu zaten Halime de değil, kervan.
english: Besides, it's not about Halime. It's about the caravan.

text: Gökçe, senin kafan niye böyle boş? Hâlâ anlamadın mı? Bu obanın başına gelen en büyük felaket o kız. Ne zaman anlayacağım bunu? Ertuğrul onun koynunu aldığı zaman mı?
english: Gokce, why are you so confused? Haven't you realized yet? The biggest disaster that this tribe is facing is that girl. When will I realize that? When Ertugrul takes her to his lap?
Come on.
Come on.
Do I have permission to come in, my Bey?
My Bey, we put you in a difficult position.
We want you to forgive us.

text: Bir daha böyle bir hata yaparsanız...
english: If you make another mistake like this...

text: Karşıma geçip, af dileyecek fırsatı bulamazsınız.
english: You cannot find an opportunity to apologize to me.

text: Beyim. Emir Hazretleri sizi görmek istiyor.
english: Sir. His Highness wants to see you.
Come on.
(Music)
Come, my child.

text: Dün gece olanlar için sana bir özür borcum var.
english: I owe you an apology for what happened last night.

text: Gerçi bu olayın arkasında herkes varsa, dayım onları bulup gereken cezayı verecek.
english: If anyone is behind this, my uncle will find them and punish them.

text: Dayıcığım. Size istediğiniz yurdu vermeye karar verdik beyoğlu.
english: Uncle. We decided to give you the homeland you wanted son.

text: Doğrusu bizi buna Nasır ikna etti.
english: Nasir convinced us to do this.

text: Burayı biliyor musun? Asi Nehri'nin batısı.
english: Do you know this place? It's west of the Asi River.

text: Topraklarının bereketli olduğunu duydum. Düşmanları da bereketlidir. Dün gece seni öldürmeye gelenlerin sınırı.
english: I heard that your lands are prosperous. Your enemies are prosperous too. The border of those who came to kill you last night...

text: Tam da şeytanla koyun koyuna yatılacak yermiş.
english: It is the place where the devil and the sheep will be laid to rest.

text: Sürümüz için bu kadar tehlikeye girmeye değer mi? Düşman bizi her daim dinç tutar.
english: Is it worth taking such a risk for your tribe? The enemy keeps us safe all the time.

text: Deli tutar. Müthiş, müthiş, müthiş, müthiş.
english: Great, great, great.

text: Bu Bozkır'ın yağız çocuklarına bayılıyorum dayıcığım.
english: I love this kid of Bozkır's.

text: Demek Akrep'in kıskacını da yoğurmak istiyorsun kaderini öyle mi Ertuğrul?
english: So you want to make your fate worse because of Akrep's jealousy?

text: Madem ki şeytanla koyun koyuna uyumaya bu kadar meraklısınız o zaman bize de
english: Since you are so eager to sleep with the devil......then you can...

text: Hayırlı olsun demektir şahı. Şehzadenize bir kez daha hayran kaldım.
english: I wish you good luck, my Dushanir. I admire your courage once again.
We have friends like you behind us...
We do not hesitate to hold our chest against the enemy.

text: Hâlâ şu Gökçe'nin laflarını mı düşünürsün Halime?
english: Are you still thinking about what Gokce said, Halime?

text: Yok. Bana ne ki söylediklerini de.
english: No. What are you telling me?
Between Ertugrul and Gokce.
What do you care?

text: İki gündür kendini yiyip bitiriyorsun. Görmüyor muyum sanıyorsun Halime?
english: You've been eating for two days. Don't you think I'm seeing?

text: Aykız biz işimizle ilgilenelim ne olur.
english: Aykiz, let us get back to work.

text: Tamam ama bak sen de şu...
english: Okay, but you...
Don't take Gokce Deli seriously.
She is a bridegroom.

text: Hayme Ana ile Gökçe kim bilir belki de...
english: Mother Hayme and Gokce, who knows...
Aykiz?
To get here.
It should contain the lye.
Halime, who would do that?

text: Neyse, her şeyin bir çaresi bulunur.
english: Anyway, there is a solution to everything.
The caravan will leave. How will we catch it?
We will raise her, Aykiz. There is no other way.
We will raise him.
I'm sorry.
We're going.
Let's go and see our father's new place.
Ertugrul Bey? Or El Aziz?
Let us not make our new servant wait long.
(Music)
And Gundogdu's.
I'll go and see.

text: Hayme ananın da buraya geldiğimi bilmesini istemiyorum.
english: I don't want mother Hayme to know that I came here.
Do not worry.
No one will know.
Especially that man.
Suleyman Shah will never know.

text: Dediğin gibi......Gündoğdu'nun saçından bir tutam getirdim.
english: As you said, I brought a pendant from Gundogdu's hair.

text: Sen büyük bir beyin kızısın Selcan. Yaşadıklarını hak etmiyorsun.
english: You are a woman of a big brain, Selcan. You don't deserve what you are living.
The vices of that woman who will be the heir.

text: Kocanın sana kurumuş bir dal gibi bakmasını. Yeter!
english: Enough!

text: Yaşadığın acılardan utanma Selcan. Hak ettiğin her şeyi alacaksın.
english: Don't be ashamed of the pain you're going through Selcan. You will get everything you deserve.

text: Ruhlar ordusu karnını erkeğinin dölüyle dolduracak.
english: The army of spirits will fill your stomach with the womb of a man.
You will have a boy.
Kayi's fate will change.

text: Hamza, yarın erkenden yola çıkacağız. Alplerin mühimmatlarını kontrol et, eksik kalmasın.
english: Hamza, we will set off early tomorrow. Check the alps' weapons, make sure they are not missing.
You're welcome, sir.
Good luck. Thank you.
I thought...
Go with your caravan.

text: Pek iyi bir fikir gibi gelmedi bana Gündoğdu.
english: It did not seem like a good idea to me, Gundogdu.

text: O niye ki? Kara Toygar itinin ne yapacağı belli olmaz. Yanına en iyi alpleri de alsan bu çok tehlikeli.
english: Why? It's not clear what the black-collar dog will do. If you take the best Alps with you, it's dangerous.
You're the son of a Bey.

text: Ertuğrul da yok. E baban da hasta.
english: Ertugrul is not here and your father is sick.
Find a way.

text: Obada kalman da fayda var. Emmi.
english: It's good for you to stay in the tribe. Uncle.

text: Ya Beyoğlu'na hiç obada pineklemek yakışır mı?
english: Does your son deserve to be a shepherd in the tribe?
Look around.

text: Bu kadar insan malını, emeğini bana emanet ettin.
english: You entrusted so much of your human wealth and labor to me.

text: E götürmek de elbette bana düşer.
english: I would like to take her.

text: Ha dediğin gibi Kara Toygar bir itlik yaparsa biz de elimizden geleni yaparız Evelal'ım.
english: If Kara Toygar does a good deed, we'll do what we can.

text: Sıkma canım. Her şeyi hazır etti kayma anam. Gökçe bitirdi kilimleri. Elleriniz dert görmesin.
english: Don't squeeze it. We've prepared everything, mother Kayma. Gokce finished the thread. I hope you're not in trouble.
I hope they find their worth in the market.

text: Bunu da sizin için dokudum Ayma Hanım.
english: I read this for you, mother Hayme.

text: Ah kızım paksın. Senin gibisin kimselerde yok kızım.
english: My beautiful daughter. No one is as beautiful as you, my daughter.

text: Bu kadar telaş içinde ne zaman yaptın bunu? Kaç gecedir uyumuyor Hayme anam.
english: When did you do that in such a hurry? He has not slept for many nights, mother Hayme.
Good. What are we going to do to Halime?
(Music)
Why did it happen, Halime?
We didn't use enough fresh water, I guess.
We will try again.

text: Sen elinden geleni yaptın. Artık sabaha yetişmez.
english: You did the best you could. You will not be able to do it in the morning.

text: Hayır. Gerekirse uyumadan sabah kadar çalışıp yetiştiririz Hayme Hanım. Sen merak etme.
english: No. We can work until morning and raise him before he goes to sleep. Do not worry.
A last egg.
Alright. Good luck.
I'm going to the forest.
Come on.
Come on.
Welcome, son.

text: Yola düşmeden önce İbn-i Meral ağabeyinin bir hayır duasını almak istemiştim.
english: I wanted to take a good deed from Ibn-i Lahr before I set off.

text: Şeyh Efendi yola çıktı, haberiniz yok mu? Nereye?
english: Sheikh Efendi is on his way. Don't you know? Where?

text: Allah bilir. Bir daha onu göremeyecek mi?
english: God knows. Will he not see her again?
God knows.

text: Ama......benim onu bulmam lazım. Kaybettin mi ki bulasın? Buldun mu ki kaybedesin?
english: But I have to find him. Did I lose to find him? Did I find him to lose?
It may be.
...the biggest stupidity in the world.

text: Kardeşinin intikamını almayı beceremediğin gibi Kaygıları da başımıza musallat ettin Efendim Ben doğru olanı yaptım
english: You failed to take your brother's revenge......and you made the Kayis suffer. Sir, I did the right thing.
You did the right thing.

text: Senden böyle bir aptallığı hiç beklemezdim. Efendim?
english: I would never expect such stupidity from you.
I don't understand who we're afraid of.

text: Ertuğrul'dan mı yoksa o yanında gördüğüm İbni Arabi'den mi?
english: From Ertugrul or from the man I saw next to him, Ibn Arabi?
How dare you say I'm scared?
Listen to me carefully.

text: Türklerin sınırlarımıza gelmesine asla izin vermeyeceksin. Asla!
english: You will never let the Turks come to our borders. Never!

text: Eğer intikam duygun görevlerinin önüne bir kez daha geçerse...
english: If the vengeance-sensitive one passes before their duties once more...

text: Seni kardeşlerimin yanına kendi ellerimle gömerim.
english: I will bury you with my brother in my own hands.
(Music)

text: Hey büyük Allah'ım sen nelere kadirsin be!
english: Oh, God! How powerful you are!
Heaven must be here.
But hell is right under our nose.

text: Evet. Oradan sonrası Antakya Haçlı Komutu.
english: Yes, after that we will be in the Crusades.

text: Tapınakçıların gizli kalesi buralarda bir yerde olmuyor.
english: The secret castle of the Templars must be somewhere around here.

text: Şeytan her yerde be Turgut. Obamızda, Halep'te.
english: The devil is everywhere, Turgut. In our tribe, in Aleppo.
Everywhere. We are so much fun.
Come on.
(Music)
Come on.
My Bey.
(Music)
God bless you, sir.

text: Taşı kaldırsan altından su fışkıracak. Ömrümde böyle bereketli topraklar görmedim. Bebeleri büyütür.
english: If you lift the stone, it will splash water from under it. I have never seen such fertile lands in my life. It will raise the babies.
He can destroy the tribes and give life to the tribe.
Such a paradise...
How could they leave him without a owner, my Bey?

text: Hemen yanı başı cehennemde o yüzden Turgut.
english: That's why he is in hell right now.

text: Sahibeyim, bu tapınakçılar niye seni öldürmek istediler ki?
english: My master, why did these Templars want to kill you?

text: Öldürdüğümüz şövalyelerin kanını yerde bırakmak niyetinde değiller anlaşılan. Beyim, desene.
english: Theyíre not trying to leave the knights we killed alive. Okay, tell me.
They wonít leave us here.
Leave these infidels.
Think about the wedding with Aykiz.
Let the tribe settle down.
First, let's have the wedding with Aykiz.
If God permits, sir.

text: Ulan üstüne teker! Başka kız olsa dayanamaz çoktan başkasına dönürdü!
english: You bastard! If there was another girl, I would have killed her!
Ah!
My Bey. We can have a double wedding.
We will make the sun, the flag and the sky our tent.
We will send our men to the unparalleled caves.

text: Pusatlarımızı yar eyleyip ordularımızı gür kılacağız.
english: We will make our armies strong by making our weapons strong.

text: Tamgamız yedi iklimde adaletin sancağı diye dalgalanacak.
english: Our flag will be waved as the flag of justice in seven seasons.

text: İlahi Muştumuzu dağların denizlerin ötesine taşıyacağız.
english: We will carry our divine idol beyond the mountains and seas.
(Music)
(Music)
You came here on your own, Ece.

text: Halep'ten beri nefesin ensemizde. Söyle, tasman kimin elinde? Sıngı!
english: We have breath of breath since Aleppo. Tell me, who has the torch? You!
Go!
I'm sorry.
He has already killed my father.
I am not going to let you go.
These are the newsstand pigeons, sir.
Then let's send them to your owner.
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
I'm sorry.
(Music)
Dear God, thank you.
(Music)
The one you've been waiting for has arrived.
What nonsense are you talking about?

text: Sen de üstüne çöken bu karabasan yüzünden yanıma gelmedin mi Petrucuk?
english: You didn't come to me because of this blackboard, Petrucci.

text: O endülüslü kafir Arabi'nin savurduğu kehanetlerin bir tekine bile inanmıyorum sevgili kardeşim Coman.
english: I do not believe a single one of the prophecies......that that infidel Arabian has cast, my dear brother Cuman.
Don't call me Cuhan.
My name is Omer.

text: Sen de çok iyi biliyorsun ki Şeyh'im İbn Arabi'nin söylediği her şey çıktı.
english: You know very well that everything my sheikh Ibn Arabi said came true.
The star rain is the expected leader's good news.

text: Moğolların önüne kattığı bu çoban sürüsü müceğine hüküm edecek.
english: Will he rule over this herd of shepherds that the Mongols have put up?

text: Onlar İslam alemini tek bir yumurta haline getirecek.
english: They will turn the Islamic world into a single egg.

text: Ve o yumruk sizin lanetli düzeninizi yerle bir edecek.
english: And that fist will unify your damned order.
(Music)
Did you get enough water, Gundogdu?
You can't find water when crossing the Kanger mountain.

text: Aldık beyim. Hayvanlara yük olmasın diye çok fazla dağılmak istemedik.
english: We did, sir. We didn't want to get too carried away because it would be a burden to the animals.

text: Güzel. Eksik bir şey kaldı mı? Var.
english: Good. Anything left? Yes.
Aykiz and Halime.
I'll go and check.
They are coming too.
I am sorry, we are late.

text: Bitti mi? Hepsi bitti Hayme Hanım.
english: Is it over? It is all over, mother Hayme.

text: Nasıl oldu? Pazara gitmeye değer mi?
english: How is it? Is it worth going to the market?

text: Göster bakayım bir tanesi nasıl olmuş.
english: Show me one of them.
How is it, lady?

text: Ömrümde bu kadar canlı renkler görmedim.
english: I have never seen such vivid colors in my life.
Good. Load the remaining bullets.
May the caravan set off.
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)

text: Gel. Kervan yola çıktı komutanım. Süleyman Şahınoğlu, Gündoğdu da başında.
english: Come. The caravan is on its way, commander. Suleyman Shahanoğlu and Gundogdu are also on it.
(Music)
Go!
I am not a child.
Come on.

text: Gel bakalım. Gel, gel. Sel gitti.
english: Come on. Come on. The flood is gone.

text: Kum kaldı. Çok şükür erlerimizin karşısında boynumuz bükülmedi.
english: There is only sand left. Thank God, we did not fall in the hands of our men.

text: Çok yoruldunuz Etrafa çeki düzen verdikten sonra Sizler de gidin dinlenin
english: You are very tired. After I give you a good rest, you can go and rest.

text: Hadi bakalım. Selcan, sen benimle gel.
english: Come on. Selcan, come with me.

text: Ne zamandır seninle konuşmak istediğim bir mesele var.
english: I have been wanting to talk to you for a while.

text: Buyur ana. Kızım. Anan ve baban öldükten sonra...
english: Yes, mother. My dear, after your parents died...

text: Sen de kardeşin Gökçe de bizim canımız ciğerimiz olduğumuz.
english: You and your brother Gokce are our blood and blood.

text: Sizi kendi öz evlatlarımdan ayrı koymamaya gayret ettim.
english: I tried not to separate you from my own children.

text: Canımız sana feda olsun Hayme anam.
english: We're all yours, mother Hayme.

text: Bilmeden bir suç mu işledik? Gönlünü mü kırdık?
english: Did we commit a crime without knowing? Did we break your heart?

text: Yok hayır, öyle bir şey değil.
english: No, it's not like that.
What I want to say is different.
The sky has grown
It is beautiful.
...became a woman.
We need to find another way.
You're right mother.

text: Ben de nice zamandır düşünürüm bunu.
english: I've been thinking about it for a long time.
So......who will we keep an eye on?
If you agree...

text: Ertuğrul ile Gökçe bir yastıkla kocasın.
english: ...Ertugrul and Gokce are a real couple.

text: Estağfurullah Hayme Hanım, bana laf mı düşer?
english: Please, mother Hayme. Don't say that.
Is that possible?
You raised him since he was little.
I wanted to tell you first.

text: Sen bir ağzını yoklayıver. Emrin olur Hayme anam.
english: You should look after your mouth. As you command, Mother Hayme.
I'm sorry.
Come on.
I'm sorry.
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
Ahmet!
Ah!
Go! Go! Go!
The dove's wing...
How much is the wolf's paw?
Suleyman Shah's son Ertugrul.
(Music)
(Music)
I'm going to take a break.
Attack!
Go!
Go!
Come on!
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
(Music)
You were going to meet with the drum and the drumsticks.

text: Bir tuhaflık var. İş güç bitmiş belli ki. Kervanda yol açıktı herhalde. Herkes ensiye yapıyordur.
english: There is something strange. It's obvious that the job is done. I guess the caravan is on its way. Everyone is doing their best.
You carry on.
I will hit my father.
Stop!
(Music)
